CustomField.description: An existing email address for a customer does not contain a valid email format and it prevents the customer file from being loaded. This field will hold those email addresses until corrected and moved into one of the 3 email addresses on the customer record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is only populated when a customer has an invalid email address in one of the Bank's source systems (Hogan, Harland, TBS, Web). This field is not editable and will only be cleared once the invalid email condition is corrected at the source.
CustomField.label: Invalid Email
